醓醓醓

醓字的基本解释

醓
tǎn
肉酱：“醓醢以荐。”

醓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǎn］
［《集韻》他感切，上感，透。］
肉汁。参见“醓醢”。

醓字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醓； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1285第25
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他感切，貪上聲。【說文】血醢也。本作?，今文作醓。【博雅】醓，醬也。【詩·大雅】醓醢以薦。【疏】用肉爲醢，特有多汁，故以醓爲名。◎按朱註：醓作平聲，音貪。又【周禮·天官·醢人】深蒲醓醢。【註】醓醢，肉醬也。　又【玉篇】酷也，酸也。　【集韻】或作?、?。

醓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
醓字的起名意思

暂无。

brine of pickled meat
Basic explanation of words
brine of pickled meat
tǎn
Meat sauce: "I recommend it."
brine of pickled meat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǎn］
["Jiyun" he has a deep, strong, and thorough feeling. ]
Gravy. See "醓醢".
brine of pickled meat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醓; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1285 Page 25
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? He is eager and greedy to speak. [Said the text] Bloody also. This work?, this article is written as 醓. [Bo Ya] Li, sauce. 【Poetry·Daya】Recommended by 醓醢醢醢. 【Sparse】Meat is used as 醓, which is especially juicy, so it is named after 醓. ◎According to Zhu's note: 醓 is a flat sound, and the sound is greedy. Also 【Zhou Li·Tianguan·Xianren】Shen Puxiong. 【Note】醓醢, meat sauce also.　[Jade Chapter] Cool, sour.　【Jiyun】Or make?,?.
brine of pickled meat
